Escala.Description: The CRM with AI, WhatsApp, and integrated marketing tools to sell more and better. Promote your services and multiply your sales with a CRM that's truly easy to use.

CodeGPT.Description: Explore our AI-powered Code Assistants and Copilot Generator Platform, specifically tailored for AI-assisted coding. We provide the perfect solution to make engineering teams work more efficiently with AI.

Primeur.Title: Primeur
Primeur.Description: PRIMEUR DATA ONE® is our Hybrid Data Integration Platform, developed based on 35 years of experience managing the data of the most important Fortune 500 companies worldwide.

OurVision.Title: Our Vision
OurVision.Subtitle: Revolutionizing the Future with AI
OurVision.Content: At Neurona, we’re driven by a bold vision to transform industries and everyday life through the power of Artificial Intelligence and immersive VR/AR technology. Our goal is to lead the charge in reshaping how businesses operate and how people experience the world around them. We believe that the future of innovation lies in harnessing these cutting-edge technologies to solve complex challenges and create smarter, more efficient solutions.

WhyNeurona.Title: Why Neurona
WhyNeurona.Subtitle: A Strategic Partner for Long-Term Growth
WhyNeurona.Content: Choosing Neurona means partnering with a forward-thinking team that’s committed to your long-term success. We don’t just offer short-term solutions; we provide scalable strategies designed to grow with your business. Whether it’s implementing cloud solutions, automating critical processes, or developing tailored machine learning models, we focus on creating a roadmap that evolves with your needs. With Neurona, you’re not just preparing for the future — you’re leading it.

AIDataStudio.Title: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Consulting
AIDataStudio.Subtitle: Development of Customized ML Models
Details: Create AI models tailored to specific problems, such as demand forecasting, process optimization, or complex data analysis.
Ethical AI Implementation: Help companies integrate artificial intelligence systems that comply with ethical and regulatory standards.
Optimization of Existing Systems: Improve the accuracy, speed, and efficiency of already implemented machine learning models.

InnovationProductStudio.Title: Consulting and Development of Intelligent Digital Products
InnovationProductStudio.Subtitle: Development of Customized Intelligent Products
Details: Unique solutions that solve complex problems according to each need.
Applications with integrated artificial intelligence and virtual reality.
Predictive models for business process optimization.
Validation and Prototyping: Consulting to assess the technical feasibility of ideas using advanced technologies.
Development of functional prototypes that allow hypothesis validation in real-world scenarios.

SoftwareDevelopmentStudio.Title: Specialized Software Consulting and Development
SoftwareDevelopmentStudio.Subtitle: SaaS (Software as a Service) Platforms
Details: Development of platforms that integrate deep tech to solve specific problems.
Development of Gaming Platforms and VR/AR XR.
Digital Twins: Construction of virtual representations to emulate real systems.
Smart IoT Products: Integration of smart sensors with AI to optimize operations.
Integration of advanced medical devices or real-time industrial monitoring.

EnterpriseTechArchitecture.Title: Strategic Consulting for Technological Implementation
EnterpriseTechArchitecture.Subtitle: Preparation for Disruptive Technologies
Details: Feasibility Assessment: Determine if deep tech is viable for solving a specific problem.
Technological Roadmap: Design a roadmap to implement advanced technologies in the company.
Education and Training: Train internal teams to adopt and use deep tech technologies.

Case1.Title: Success Story: Kaumer in Colombia
Case1.Description: Neurona has built Kaumer's platform on AWS, designed to be scalable, resilient, and cost-efficient. This solution not only significantly reduces operational costs but also lays the foundation for the implementation of artificial intelligence, optimizing processes and accelerating strategic decision-making.

Case2.Title: Success Story: The Visionverse
Case2.Description: Neurona has migrated 'The Visionverse' platform to AWS using EC2 instances. The implemented solution has allowed The Visionverse to reduce its operational costs and improve platform availability, ensuring an optimal user experience.

Frameworks.Title: We Work with International Architecture Frameworks
Frameworks.Subtitle: These are some of the frameworks we use to ensure high-standard solutions.
Frameworks.BIAN: Global standards for financial architecture solutions.
Frameworks.AWS: Framework for building secure, efficient cloud applications.
